languages.text: {n}Тощая бледная женщина особенно выделяется среди других членов экипажа. Из задней части черепа сплошной массой выходят связки кабелей, скрывающиеся под церемониальным одеянием, а вместо рта зияет решетка вокса, который едва слышно фонит. При виде вас женщина склоняет голову в приветственном поклоне:{/n} "Чем могу служить, Лорд-капитан?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Тощая бледная женщина особенно выделяется среди других членов экипажа. Из задней части черепа сплошной массой выходят связки кабелей, скрывающиеся под церемониальным одеянием, а вместо рта зияет решетка вокса, который едва слышно фонит. При виде вас женщина склоняет голову в приветственном поклоне:{/n} "Чем могу служить, Лорд-капитан?"

languages.text: {n}A thin, pale woman stands out among the rest of the crew. There is a thick bundle of cables coming out of the back of her skull and disappearing under her ceremonial garment, and you see the grate of a quietly humming vox where her mouth should be. The woman sees you and bows her head in a respectful greeting:{/n} "How may I serve you, Lord Captain?"
languages.original_text: {n}Тощая бледная женщина особенно выделяется среди других членов экипажа. Из задней части черепа сплошной массой выходят связки кабелей, скрывающиеся под церемониальным одеянием, а вместо рта зияет решетка вокса, который едва слышно фонит. При виде вас женщина склоняет голову в приветственном поклоне:{/n} "Чем могу служить, Лорд-капитан?"

traits.locale_text: {n}A thin pale woman stands head and shoulders above the rest of the crew. There is a thick mass of cables coming out from the back of her skull and disappearing under a ceremonial garment, and you see the grate of a quietly humming vox where a normal person's mouth would be. The woman sees you and bows her head in a respectful greeting:{/n} "How may I serve you, Lord Captain?"

{n}A thin, pale woman stands head and shoulders above the rest of the crew. There is a thick bundle of cables coming out of the back of her skull and disappearing under her ceremonial garment, and you see the grate of a quietly humming vox where her mouth should be. The woman sees you and bows her head in a respectful greeting:{/n} "How may I serve you, Lord Captain?"

{n}A thin, pale woman stands head and shoulders above the rest of the crew. There is a thick bundle of cables coming out of the back of her skull and disappearing under her ceremonial garment, and you see the grate of a quietly humming vox where her mouth should be. The woman sees you and bows her head in a respectful greeting:{/n} "How may I serve you, Lord Captain?"

{n}A thin, pale woman stands stands out among the rest of the crew. There is a thick bundle of cables coming out of the back of her skull and disappearing under her ceremonial garment, and you see the grate of a quietly humming vox where her mouth should be. The woman sees you and bows her head in a respectful greeting:{/n} "How may I serve you, Lord Captain?"

{n}A thin, pale woman stands out among the rest of the crew. There is a thick bundle of cables coming out of the back of her skull and disappearing under her ceremonial garment, and you see the grate of a quietly humming vox where her mouth should be. The woman sees you and bows her head in a respectful greeting:{/n} "How may I serve you, Lord Captain?"

languages.text: {n}Una mujer pálida y delgada destaca del resto de la tripulación. Una maraña densa de cables brota de la parte trasera de su cráneo y pasa por debajo de su atuendo ceremonial. La parrilla zumbante de un voco ocupa el lugar donde normalmente estaría la boca. La mujer te ve e inclina la cabeza en respetuoso saludo:{/n} «Lord Capitán, ¿puedo ayudar en algo?».
languages.original_text: {n}A thin, pale woman stands out among the rest of the crew. There is a thick bundle of cables coming out of the back of her skull and disappearing under her ceremonial garment, and you see the grate of a quietly humming vox where her mouth should be. The woman sees you and bows her head in a respectful greeting:{/n} "How may I serve you, Lord Captain?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Una mujer pálida y delgada se yergue por encima del resto de la tripulación. Una maraña densa de cables brota de la parte trasera de su cráneo y pasa por debajo de su atuendo ceremonial. La parrilla zumbante de un voco ocupa el lugar donde normalmente estaría la boca. La mujer te ve e inclina la cabeza en respetuoso saludo:{/n} «L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}, ¿puedo ayudar en algo?».

languages.text: {n}一位身材瘦削、皮肤苍白的女性站在船员之中，看起来特别显眼。从她的后脑勺处伸出了一束粗大的电缆，消失在她的制服下面，原本应该是嘴巴的地方变成了音阵系统，正发出安静的嗡嗡声。这个女人看到你，低下头，恭敬地问候着。{/n}“需要我为您做些什么呢，舰长大人？”
languages.original_text: {n}A thin, pale woman stands out among the rest of the crew. There is a thick bundle of cables coming out of the back of her skull and disappearing under her ceremonial garment, and you see the grate of a quietly humming vox where her mouth should be. The woman sees you and bows her head in a respectful greeting:{/n} "How may I serve you, Lord Captain?"

traits.locale_text: {n}一位身材瘦削、皮肤苍白的女性站在船员之中，看起来特别显眼。从她的后脑勺处伸出了一束粗大的电缆，消失在她的制服下面，原本应该是嘴巴的地方变成了音阵系统，正发出安静的嗡嗡声。这个女人看到你，低下头，恭敬地问候道：{/n}“需要我为您做些什么呢，舰长大人？”

languages.text: {n}Eine schlanke, blasse Frau sticht aus dem Rest der Crew heraus. Aus der Rückseite ihres Schädels ragt ein dickes Bündel Kabel heraus und verschwindet unter ihrer zeremoniellen Kleidung. Du siehst das Gitter eines leise summenden Vox, wo eigentlich ihr Mund sein sollte. Die Frau erblickt dich und senkt respektvoll grüßend den Kopf.{/n} "Wie kann ich Euch dienen, Lord Captain?"
languages.original_text: {n}A thin, pale woman stands out among the rest of the crew. There is a thick bundle of cables coming out of the back of her skull and disappearing under her ceremonial garment, and you see the grate of a quietly humming vox where her mouth should be. The woman sees you and bows her head in a respectful greeting:{/n} "How may I serve you, Lord Captain?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine schlanke, blasse Frau überragt den Rest der Crew deutlich. Aus der Rückseite ihres Schädels ragt ein dickes Bündel Kabel heraus und verschwindet unter ihrer zeremoniellen Kleidung. Du siehst das Gitter eines leise summenden Vox, wo eigentlich ihr Mund sein sollte. Die Frau erblickt dich und senkt respektvoll grüßend den Kopf.{/n} "Wie kann ich Euch dienen, Lord Captain?"

languages.text: {n}Une femme pâle et mince se démarque du reste de l'équipage. Un épais faisceau de câbles sort de l'arrière de son crâne et disparaît sous son vêtement cérémoniel. Vous voyez également la grille d'un vox bourdonnant doucement là où sa bouche devrait se trouver. En vous voyant, elle incline la tête pour vous saluer respectueusement.{/n} « Comment puis-je vous servir, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ? »
languages.original_text: {n}A thin, pale woman stands out among the rest of the crew. There is a thick bundle of cables coming out of the back of her skull and disappearing under her ceremonial garment, and you see the grate of a quietly humming vox where her mouth should be. The woman sees you and bows her head in a respectful greeting:{/n} "How may I serve you, Lord Captain?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Une femme pâle et mince domine les autres membres d'équipage de sa grande taille. Un épais faisceau de câbles sort de l'arrière de son crâne et disparaît sous son vêtement cérémoniel. Vous voyez également la grille d'un vox bourdonnant doucement là où sa bouche devrait se trouver. En vous voyant, elle incline la tête pour vous saluer respectueusement.{/n} « Comment puis-je vous servir, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ? »

languages.text: {n}他のクルーの中で、その痩せた青白い女性は一際目立っている。頭蓋骨の後ろから伸びる太いケーブルの束は儀式用着の下へと隠れ、口があるべき場所には、静かにブーンと音を立てる格子状のヴォクスがあった。彼女はこちらを見て、丁寧に頭を下げて挨拶する。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、何かご用命はございますか？」
languages.original_text: {n}A thin, pale woman stands out among the rest of the crew. There is a thick bundle of cables coming out of the back of her skull and disappearing under her ceremonial garment, and you see the grate of a quietly humming vox where her mouth should be. The woman sees you and bows her head in a respectful greeting:{/n} "How may I serve you, Lord Captain?"

traits.locale_text: {n}他のクルーの中で、その痩せた青白い女性は一際目立っている。頭蓋骨の後ろから伸びる太いケーブルの束は儀式用着の下へと隠れ、口があるべき場所には、静かにブーンと音を立てる格子状のヴォクスがあった。彼女はこちらを見て、丁寧に頭を下げて挨拶する。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、何かご用命はございますか？」

languages.text: {n}Mürettebat arasında ince, solgun bir kadın dikkat çekiyor. Birtakım kablo yığınları, kafasının arka tarafından çıkıp merasim kıyafetinin içinde kayboluyor. Ayrıca ağzının olması gereken yerde bulunup belli belirsiz uğuldayan voks ızgarasını görebiliyorsun. Kadın seni görüyor ve saygıyla başını eğiyor.{/n} "Size nasıl hizmet edebilirim Lord Kaptan?"
languages.original_text: {n}A thin, pale woman stands out among the rest of the crew. There is a thick bundle of cables coming out of the back of her skull and disappearing under her ceremonial garment, and you see the grate of a quietly humming vox where her mouth should be. The woman sees you and bows her head in a respectful greeting:{/n} "How may I serve you, Lord Captain?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Mürettebat üyelerinin arasında ince, solgun bir kadın dikkat çekiyor. Kafasının arka tarafından çıkan ve merasim kıyafetinin içinde kaybolan kalın kablo yığınları var. Ayrıca ağzının olması gereken yerde belli belirsiz uğuldayan voks ızgarasını görebiliyorsun. Kadın seni görüyor ve saygıyla başını eğiyor:{/n} "Size nasıl hizmet edebilirim Lord Kaptan?"
